verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4236'>نز</tajweed>َلْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ فِى لَيْلَةِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14580'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14581'>دْ</tajweed>رِ
verses.translation: Мы повелели снизойти Корану в ночь Аль Кадра

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13858'>دْ</tajweed>رَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٮٰ</tajweed>كَ مَا لَيْلَةُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14582'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14581'>دْ</tajweed>رِ
verses.translation: Как изъяснить тебе, что значит "ночь Аль Кадра

verses.text_uthmani: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَيْلَةُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14582'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14581'>دْ</tajweed>رِ خَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':1231'>رٌ م</tajweed>ِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ

verses.text_uthmani: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَنَزَّلُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14583'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَةُ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13916'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':14584'>ِم م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':843'>ن ك</tajweed>ُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Tanazzalul-malā'ikatu war rūḥu fīhā bi'iżni rabbihim min kulli amr(in).
verses.translation: В ночь эту ангелы и Дух (Святой) Нисходят с неба с Божьего соизволенья, Чтобы вершить все повеления Его

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: سَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مٌ هِىَ حَتَّىٰ مَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14585'>طْ</tajweed>لَعِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14586'>ٱ</tajweed>لْفَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':996'>جْ</tajweed>رِ
verses.translation: И в эту ночь до появления зари Мир воцаряется (на всей земле)
